criteria.description: Register a new social media account for a user
criteria.given: A valid user ID and social media details
criteria.when: The user submits the social media registration form
criteria.then: The social media account is saved and linked to the user's profile
edge_cases: The user ID does not exist
The social media details are incomplete or invalid
The user tries to register a social media account that is already linked to another user

criteria.description: Handle errors during social media registration
criteria.given: An invalid user ID or social media details
criteria.when: The user submits the social media registration form
criteria.then: An error message is displayed and the social media account is not registered

criteria.description: Update project documentation to include the new feature
criteria.given: The new social media registration feature is implemented
criteria.when: The project documentation is being updated
criteria.then: The README.md and other relevant documentation reflect the new feature accurately
edge_cases: Previous documentation standards are not maintained
Important information about the new feature is omitted

unit_tests: Test that a valid social media registration adds a new entry to the database
Test that an error is thrown and caught if the social media details are invalid
Test that an error is thrown and caught if the user ID does not exist
integration_tests: Test the integration between the UserSocialMediaRegistration component and the database to ensure data is saved correctly
e2e_tests: Test the complete flow from entering social media details in the UI to data being saved in the database
